title: Lease a newly renovated 1x1 unit at The Grove
posting_body: ['VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'The Grove Garden, managed by Sares-Regis Group', '243 Buena Vista Avenue', 'Sunnyvale, CA 94086', 'show contact info', 'The Grove Garden Apartments is a gated community in Sunnyvale, CA.', 'We have all the modern amenities in a great Silicon Valley location.', 'Cal now for more details!', 'Experience the tranquility of living at a newly-renovated community while remaining in the heart of Silicon Valley.', ' Our community has transformed into a modern, vibrant living center with an unparalleled quality of living.', ' Relax in our poolside cabana while enjoying our free Wi-Fi.', ' Exercise in our newly-constructed gym which is located near our second pool.', ' Enjoy the evening at the fire pit adjacent to our modernized Jacuzzi.', ' Reserve our beautiful clubhouse with kitchenette for your next event.', ' Enjoy the convenience and reliability of our package lockers for all of your deliveries, as well as the peace of mind that comes with living in a gated and patrolled community.', " Our community features a children's play area, as well as exterior bicycle storage options.", ' All of these features and many more are available to our residents.', 'Pets are also welcome here!', ' In order to assure the highest quality of living for our residents, some restrictions apply (breed, weight, etc. call for details!)', 'In addition to our community amenities, all our residents can enjoy modern in-unit laundry machines as well as upgraded stainless-steel kitchen appliances including dishwashers and microwaves.', ' A generous storage space comes standard on your private patio or balcony, as does ample closet space within the home.', ' Some of our top-floor apartments even offer air conditioning!', 'Seize the opportunity to reserve your dream apartment today with only a $500 deposit, which is fully refundable within three days.', ' Be sure to ask about our latest move-in specials!', ' Our friendly and knowledgeable management staff will guide you through the simple application process and ensure that your move-in is free of uncertainties.', 'Call us today to schedule a tour of your new home!', ' Please also visit us on the web.', 'We hope to see you soon!', 'This apartment requires a $500 deposit.', 'Apartment Features', '* Private Balcony', '* Linen Closet', '* Ceiling Fan', '* Electric Stove', '* Quartz Countertops', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Microwave', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Electric Stove', '* Private Patio', '* Full sized Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Dishwasher', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* Wood-Like Floors', '* Refrigerator', '* GE Appliances', '* Walk-in Closet', '* Extra Storage', '* Disposal', '* Washer and Dryer in unit', '[#9343855]']
